short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically activates your chronological Following feed by default when you open Threads app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***********
Note, this extension isn't really needed anymore. Just bookmark https://www.threads.net/following and use that when you visit Threads.
***********

This simple Chrome extension redirects Threads app to always open to your Following feed (also known as reverse chronological timeline) instead of the Home feed.

Open up http://www.threads.net and you'll automatically start seeing your Following Feed. 

Need to change back to the For You feed? Just click on the For You feed in the bottom left!
